title: Merge Pool 2048
description: Merge Pool 2048 is a casual game that challenges you to merge pucks with the same number to achieve a bigger one until you reach the ultimate goal of 2048. With progressive level design and fantastic elements, each level presents a unique challenge. Some groups may help you, while others make it more difficult to achieve your goal. With various playing boards and puck formations, Merge Pool 2048 is an excellent time killer that keeps you entertained for hours.
